intro: Dichaelia distincta, commonly known as the slender dichaelia, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its slender stems and small, opposite leaves. It produces clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers, which are typically arranged in cymes. Dichaelia distincta is often found in grasslands and open woodlands, where it thrives in well-drained soils.
